Class Game

java.lang.Object

public class Game extends Object

  • Method Details

    • positionToString

      public String positionToString(int col, int row)
      Get string representation of a game object at position (col, row) if it exists
      Parameters:
      col - column position of the game object
      row - row position of the game object
      Returns:
      string representation of a game object if it exists at position (col, row), otherwise return an empty string

    • addNewPlant

      public boolean addNewPlant(String plantName, int row, int col)
      Add new plant based one the provided name and position and pay for the new plant is the adding is successful
      Parameters:
      plantName - name of the new plant
      row - row position of the new plant
      col - column position of the new plant
      Returns:
      true if the new plant is successfully added to the game
